He said: When one of you comes to a man as if he has ascertained his affair, Ibrahim mentioned the Sunnah and encouraged it, and mentioned what people have innovated and disliked it.

Farqad said: O Abu Imran, why don't you forbid this one from undoing his buttons and this one from braiding his hair? Abraham said: I don't know if the stupidity of the tribe of Asad has overcome you or the thickness of the tribe of Tamim. As for this one, he found the heat and undid his buttons, and as for this one, he lets his hair down when he wants to pray, God willing.
